# Creating a Scene with a Transparent Background

**Article**

Set a transparent background color to show the content of the views below.

## Overview

To overlay content rendered with SpriteKit on top of another view, follow these steps:

1. Set the scene’s [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKScene/backgroundColor] to clear.
2. Enable [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKView/allowsTransparency] on the view.
3. Set the view’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIView/backgroundColor] to `clear`.

## Setting the Background Appearance

- **view**: The view that is currently presenting the scene.
- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the scene.
